briefTitle: A Study of Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Patients Receiving Second-Line Nivolumab Monotherapy in Asia
officialTitle: An Open Label, Safety Study of Participants With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Receiving Second-Line Nivolumab Monotherapy in Asia
summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety of patients in Asia with Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC)who are treated with Nivolumab monotherapy as a second line or third line treatment.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Non-HBV Participants Experiencing High Grade Treatment-Related Select Adverse Events
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose up to 100 days post dose, up to approximately 36 months
